_header: I wot a tree twelve boughs betake
_description: ‘Anigmata’: a riddle on the days, weeks and months of the year, translating ‘Est arbor quadam ramos retinens duodenos &c.’ — five lines

BLHar3362.Transcription: I wot a tre xii bowys betakelii nestys beþ þer vp ymadIn euery nest beþ bryddys viii thankyd be þe god of heuene& euery bryd wyth selcouth name
